content:
Currently this ticket https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-30515 is marked as Applied, but looking at http://build.fhir.org/conceptmap2-operation-translate.html the changes do not align.
In particular the types for match.dependsOn.value and match.product.value are incorrect.

I cannot comment on the ticket itself since it is closed. Should I just be opening a new ticket?

Thanks @Michael Lawley Yes, please open a new ticket with the related artifact = ConceptMap, Grouping = R5, Workgroup = Vocab, and link to this one. I'll add this to the agenda for today's tracker call so it can be addressed even if you don't get to it before then.
